titleStmt.title: The dialogue in the last opera, call'd The fairy queen
Fairy queen. Now the maids and the men are making their hay
titleStmt.author: Purcell, Henry, 1659-1695.
Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.

notesStmt.note: Possibly from a collection such as Purcell's Collection of the most celebrated songs & dialogues, 1705?
Attributed by Wing to E. Settle, the supposed author of the play.
Imperfect: all after p. 4 lacking in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
